resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107451</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107451</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085956</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The challenge of a broken pencil</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Herausforderung eines unterbrochenen 
Bleistifts</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le défi d'un crayon cassé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O desafio de um lápis quebrado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sfida di una matita rotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πρόκληση ενός σπασμένου μολυβιού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El desafío de un lápiz quebrado</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">From dealing with meltdowns to setting a routine, Rhonda Layman shares communication and management strategies for students with autism spectrum disorders.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vom Beschäftigen Einschmelzen zur Einstellung 
eines Programms, teilt Rhonda Laie Kommunikation und 
Managementstrategien für Kursteilnehmer mit autism 
Spektrumstörungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De traiter des fusions à placer un 
sous-programme, le laïque de Rhonda partage des stratégies de 
transmission et de gestion pour des étudiants avec des désordres de 
spectre d'autism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De tratar dos meltdowns a ajustar uma rotina, o 
layman de Rhonda compartilha de estratégias de uma comunicação e da
gerência para estudantes com os disorders do spectrum do autism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dall'occuparsi delle fusioni a regolare una 
procedura, il laico di Rhonda ripartisce le strategie della gestione e
di comunicazione per gli allievi con i disordini di spettro di autism.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Από την εξέταση των ρευστοποιήσεων στον καθορισμό μιας
ρουτίνας, ο λαϊκός (μη κληρικός) Rhonda μοιράζεται τις 
στρατηγικές επικοινωνίας και διαχείρισης για τους σπουδαστές με 
τις αναταραχές φάσματος αυτισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De ocuparse de fusiones a fijar una rutina, el 
laico de Rhonda comparte las estrategias de la comunicación y de la 
gerencia para los estudiantes con desórdenes del espectro del autism.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WAVERLY HARRELL
FN:WAVERLY HARRELL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107451</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

  </manifestation>
